results.name: Number of primes of the form k*n - k + n, 1 <= k <= n.
comment: a(n) = sum(A010051(A162610(n,k)): k=1..n) = number of primes in n-th row of the triangle in A162610. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 19 2013
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
